languages.text: Безжалостность, с которой Кассия преследовала инакомыслие, не осталась незамеченной. Джай Хейдари дважды встречалась с бывшей соратницей и взывала к ее милосердию. Вторая их встреча завершилась смертельной ссорой. Вскоре обнаружилось, что диссидентам Орселлио помогают сбежать от расправы корабли Миссии Касбаллики. Кассия прилюдно поклялась отомстить Леди Хейдари за предательство былой дружбы.

The ruthlessness with which Cassia persecuted dissent did not go unnoticed. Jae Heydari met with her former companion twice and appealed to her mercy. Their second meeting ended in a deadly quarrel, and it was soon discovered that Kasballica Mission ships were helping the Orsellio dissidents to escape reprisal. Cassia publicly swore revenge on Lady Heydari for betraying her former friendship.
languages.original_text: Безжалостность, с которой Кассия преследовала инакомыслие, не осталась незамеченной. Джай Хейдари дважды встречалась с бывшей соратницей и взывала к ее милосердию. Their second meeting ended in a deadly quarrel, and it was soon discovered that Kasballica Mission ships were helping the Orsellio dissidents to escape reprisal. Cassia publicly swore revenge on Lady Heydari for betraying her former friendship.

languages.text: 卡西娅残酷地迫害持有不同政见的成员，她的暴行并没有被忽视。很快，婕伊·海达利便与她曾经的伙伴见了两次面，请求她的宽恕。两人的第二次会面爆发了可怕的争吵，没过多久，卡西娅便发现卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的舰船偷偷帮助奥赛罗家族的成员逃脱政治报复。卡西娅公开发誓要报复海达利女士，因为她背叛了两人的友谊。
languages.original_text: The ruthlessness with which Cassia persecuted dissent did not go unnoticed. Jae Heydari met with her former companion twice and appealed to her mercy. Their second meeting ended in a deadly quarrel, and it was soon discovered that Kasballica Mission ships were helping the Orsellio dissidents to escape reprisal. Cassia publicly swore revenge on Lady Heydari for betraying her former friendship.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅残酷地迫害持有不同政见的成员，她的暴行并没有被忽视。很快，婕伊·海达利便与她曾经的伙伴见了两次面，请求她的宽恕。两人的第二次会面爆发了可怕的争吵，没过多久，卡西娅便发现卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的舰船偷偷帮助奥塞罗家族的成员逃脱政治报复。卡西娅公开发誓要报复海达利女士，因为她背叛了两人的友谊。

languages.text: カシアが反逆者を迫害した無慈悲さが見過ごされることはなかった。ジェイ・ヘイダリは過去の仲間に2度会って慈悲を乞うた。この2回目の会合は和解不能な口論で終わり、そのすぐあとにカスバリカ聖務団の船がオーセリオ家に対する反逆者が制裁を逃れるのを助けていることがわかった。
languages.original_text: The ruthlessness with which Cassia persecuted dissent did not go unnoticed. Jae Heydari met with her former companion twice and appealed to her mercy. Their second meeting ended in a deadly quarrel, and it was soon discovered that Kasballica Mission ships were helping the Orsellio dissidents to escape reprisal. Cassia publicly swore revenge on Lady Heydari for betraying her former friendship.

traits.locale_text: カシアが反逆者を迫害した無慈悲さが見過ごされることはなかった。ジェイ・ヘイダリは過去の仲間に2度会って慈悲を乞うた。この2回目の会合は和解不能な口論で終わり、そのすぐあとにカスバリカ聖務団の船がオーセリオ家に対する反逆者が制裁を逃れるのを助けていることがわかった。

languages.text: La brutalité avec laquelle Cassia persécuta les dissidents ne passa pas inaperçue. Jae Heydari rencontra par deux fois son ancienne compagne pour en appeler à sa clémence. Leur seconde rencontre se solda par une querelle mortelle, et l'on découvrit rapidement que des vaisseaux de la Mission de la Kasballica aidaient les dissidents de la maison Orsellio à échapper aux représailles. Cassia jura publiquement de se venger de dame Heydari pour avoir trahi leur ancienne amitié.
languages.original_text: The ruthlessness with which Cassia persecuted dissent did not go unnoticed. Jae Heydari met with her former companion twice and appealed to her mercy. Their second meeting ended in a deadly quarrel, and it was soon discovered that Kasballica Mission ships were helping the Orsellio dissidents to escape reprisal. Cassia publicly swore revenge on Lady Heydari for betraying her former friendship.

traits.locale_text: La brutalité avec laquelle Cassia persécuta les dissidents ne passa pas inaperçue. Jae Heydari rencontra par deux fois son ancienne compagne pour en appeler à sa clémence. Leur seconde rencontre se solda par une querelle mortelle, et l'on découvrit rapidement que des vaisseaux de la Mission de la Kasballica aidaient les dissidents de la maison Orsellio à échapper aux représailles. Cassia jura publiquement de se venger de dame Heydari pour avoir trahi leur ancienne amitié.

languages.text: La crueldad con la que Cassia persiguió a los disidentes no pasó desapercibida. Jae Heydari se reunió con su antigua compañera dos veces para apelar a su compasión. Su segundo encuentro acabó en una disputa letal, y pronto se descubrió que naves de la misión Kasballica estaban ayudando a los disidentes de los Orsellio a escapar de la represión. Cassia juró venganza públicamente contra lady Heydari por traicionar su vieja amistad.
languages.original_text: The ruthlessness with which Cassia persecuted dissent did not go unnoticed. Jae Heydari met with her former companion twice and appealed to her mercy. Their second meeting ended in a deadly quarrel, and it was soon discovered that Kasballica Mission ships were helping the Orsellio dissidents to escape reprisal. Cassia publicly swore revenge on Lady Heydari for betraying her former friendship.

traits.locale_text: La crueldad con la que Cassia persiguió a los disidentes no pasó desapercibida. Jae Heydari se reunió con su antigua compañera dos veces para apelar a su compasión. Su segundo encuentro acabó en una disputa letal, y pronto se descubrió que naves de la misión Kasballica estaban ayudando a los disidentes de los Orsellio a escapar de la represión. Cassia juró venganza públicamente contra lady Heydari por traicionar su vieja amistad.

languages.text: Die Rücksichtslosigkeit, mit der Cassia Zwist verfolgte, blieb nicht unbemerkt. Jae Heydari traf sich zweimal mit ihrer früheren Gefährtin und appellierte an ihre Milde. Das zweite Zusammentreffen endete in einem unversöhnlichen Streit, und bald darauf kam heraus, dass Kasballica-Schiffe den Orsellio-Dissidenten halfen, den Konsequenzen zu entgehen. Cassia schwor Lady Heydari öffentlich Rache, weil sie ihre vormalige Freundschaft verraten habe.
languages.original_text: The ruthlessness with which Cassia persecuted dissent did not go unnoticed. Jae Heydari met with her former companion twice and appealed to her mercy. Their second meeting ended in a deadly quarrel, and it was soon discovered that Kasballica Mission ships were helping the Orsellio dissidents to escape reprisal. Cassia publicly swore revenge on Lady Heydari for betraying her former friendship.

traits.locale_text: Die Rücksichtslosigkeit, mit der Cassia Zwist verfolgte, blieb nicht unbemerkt. Jae Heydari traf sich zweimal mit ihrer früheren Gefährtin und appellierte an ihre Milde. Das zweite Zusammentreffen endete in einem unversöhnlichen Streit, und bald darauf kam heraus, dass Kasballica-Schiffe den Orsellio-Dissidenten halfen, den Konsequenzen zu entgehen. Cassia schwor Lady Heydari öffentlich Rache, weil sie ihre vormalige Freundschaft verraten habe.

languages.text: Cassia'nın merhametsizliği ve muhaliflere uyguladığı zulüm dikkatlerden kaçmadı. Jae Heydari eski yoldaşıyla iki kez buluştu ve ondan merhametli olmasını diledi. İkinci buluşmaları ölümcül bir münakaşayla bitti ve kısa süre sonra Kasballica Misyonu gemilerinin, Orsellio'ya karşı olanların misillemelerden kaçmasına yardım ettikleri ortaya çıktı. Cassia, eski dostluklarına ihanet eden Leydi Heydari'den intikam alacağına herkesin önünde yemin etti.
languages.original_text: The ruthlessness with which Cassia persecuted dissent did not go unnoticed. Jae Heydari met with her former companion twice and appealed to her mercy. Their second meeting ended in a deadly quarrel, and it was soon discovered that Kasballica Mission ships were helping the Orsellio dissidents to escape reprisal. Cassia publicly swore revenge on Lady Heydari for betraying her former friendship.

traits.locale_text: Cassia'nın merhametsizliği ve muhaliflere uyguladığı zulüm dikkatlerden kaçmadı. Jae Heydari eski yoldaşıyla iki kez buluştu ve ondan merhametli olmasını diledi. İkinci buluşmaları ölümcül bir münakaşayla bitti ve kısa süre sonra Kasballica Misyonu gemilerinin, Orsellio'ya karşı olanların misillemelerden kaçmasına yardım ettikleri ortaya çıktı. Cassia, eski dostluklarına ihanet eden Leydi Heydari'den intikam alacağına herkesin önünde yemin etti.
